reviewText: This is required viewing for any ballet lover.  Fernando Bujones is, arguably, the greatest male classical ballet dancer the world has known.  His technique, elegance, vitality and passion are beyond description.  Here  are excerpt after excerpt of some of his greatest roles, danced as you've  never seen them danced before.  Baryshnikov and Nureyev are geniuses of the  dance, of course; but Bujones is something all together special and this  wonderful video is a timeless tribute to this the most elegant of art  forms:  Ballet!  Please Amazon make available again.
